query:
-- 获取刚创建的股票用户ID
SELECT id FROM stockUsers WHERE name = '客户A' ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 1;

-- 为用户ID=1授权访问客户A（使用具体的stockUserId）
INSERT INTO stockUserPermissions (userId, stockUserId, profitPercentage, deposit, authorizationDate) 
SELECT 1, id, 30, '50000.00', '2024-01-01' FROM stockUsers WHERE name = '客户A' ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 1;

-- 为客户A添加每日余额数据
INSERT INTO stockBalances (stockUserId, date, balance) 
SELECT id, '2026-01-04', '510000.00' FROM stockUsers WHERE name = '客户A' ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 1
UNION ALL
SELECT id, '2026-01-05', '512000.00' FROM stockUsers WHERE name = '客户A' ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 1
UNION ALL
SELECT id, '2026-01-06', '515000.00' FROM stockUsers WHERE name = '客户A' ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 1
UNION ALL
SELECT id, '2026-01-07', '513000.00' FROM stockUsers WHERE name = '客户A' ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 1
UNION ALL
SELECT id, '2026-01-08', '518000.00' FROM stockUsers WHERE name = '客户A' ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 1
UNION ALL
SELECT id, '2026-01-09', '519802.52' FROM stockUsers WHERE name = '客户A' ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 1
UNION ALL
SELECT id, '2026-01-10', '522000.00' FROM stockUsers WHERE name = '客户A' ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 1;
